price: (5) Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?[1914]
arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
footnotes: [1914]- Based upon the following verses, what has been sworn to by Allāh is that He will certainly punish the disbelievers.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: hal fī dhālika qasamun lidhī ḥij'rin
